page.title: 03FARMING IN BRANSTON
page.content: Patrick Dean, Mr. Tinsley and Mr. Nelstrop are all local farmers. They combine to make a big farming company called Branston Produce. Patrick Dean Ltd. is a typical organisation because they grow well-known crops. They sell their crops for cash. They have a lot of animals. Patrick Dean owns 1750 acres of land. They have about 75 employees. They plant in their fields 270 acres of peas for freezing, broad beans for freezing on 40 acres, 430 acres of winter wheat, 160 acres of winter barley, 220 acres of spring barley, 380 acres of sugar beet, 160 acres of potatoes and 8 acres of dutch cabbage. The company has 3 forklift trucks, 17 tractors, 2 lorries and 1 JCB earth mover. They have a farm shop, a workshop, a mill and an animal unit.
